name: Meshu Alligators Blue Pen
description: The Meshu pen will be a bright attribute of a great mood at work or study. The elegant body of the pen is complemented by a cute toy.

name: Rainbow Sticky Notes
description: Colorful sticky notes perfect for jotting down quick reminders or messages.

name: Patterned Binder Clips
description: Decorative binder clips with various patterns to add a touch of style to your documents.

name: Assorted Highlighters Set
description: Set of vibrant highlighters in assorted colors, ideal for marking important points in notes or textbooks.

name: Cute Animal Erasers
description: Adorable animal-shaped erasers to make correcting mistakes fun and enjoyable.

name: Colorful Pencils Pack
description: Pack of 12 colored pencils in assorted vibrant colors, perfect for art projects or highlighting notes.

name: Mathematics Compass
description: Precision mathematics compass for drawing circles and arcs in geometry and trigonometry.

name: Geometry Set
description: Complete geometry set including rulers, protractors, and triangles, ideal for geometry classes and technical drawing.

name: Scientific Calculator
description: Advanced scientific calculator with functions for algebra, trigonometry, calculus, and statistics.

name: Composition Notebook
description: Standard composition notebook with wide-ruled paper, suitable for taking notes or journaling.
